title: Mobile App page | IC Markets
meta: Discover high-performance tools that give you the power to trade global markets on the go. Available on Andriod & iOS.
mobile_app_header_1: Trade on the go with IC Markets mobile app
mobile_app_header_2: Discover high-performance tools that give you the power to trade global markets on the go. Available on Andriod & iOS.
mobile_app_feature_1: Access a world of choice and CFD trading on the world's most popular financial instruments.
mobile_app_feature_2: Buy and sell CFDs at low spreads and fast execution.
mobile_app_feature_3: Fund accounts via leading payment methods and transfer funds between accounts.
mobile_app_feature_4: Live chat with our customer support.Multilanguage 24/7 support.
mobile_app_feature_5: Check out economic events in the calendar.
mobile_app_feature_6: Easy monitoring of your balance, equity and margin.
mobile_app_section1_text: Get in contact with our 24/7 dedicated support from the IC Markets App at any time.
mobile_app_section2_text: Upload documents and verify your ID directly from your phone.
mobile_app_section3_heading: Multiple methods of payments and withdrawal
mobile_app_section3_text: Make deposits and withdrawals directly from the app with different currencies and multiple methods.
mobile_app_footer_1: Trade global markets on the move with IC Markets
mobile_app_footer_2: Trade Forex, commodities, indices, stocks, futures, bonds, and cryptocurrencies from your phone with industry-leading tight spreads.
mobile_app_trader_heading: IC Markets MetaTrader and cTrader Native Mobile
